person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: His previous posts include assistant director of the national planning office of Papua New Guinea from 1969 to 1973 .

Let's think step by step.

1. His
2. assistant director
3. of the national planning office
4. of Papua New Guinea
5. from 1969 to 1973.

Entities:
1. His (Person)
2. assistant director (Role)
3. of the national planning office (Organization)
4. of Papua New Guinea (Country/Location)
5. from 1969 to 1973 (Time Period)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

1. His (Person)
2. assistant director (Role)
3. Himself (Person)

Entities:
1. His (Person)
2. assistant director (Role)

Note: In this context, "His" refers back to the person being discussed in the paragraph, so it can be considered as a reference to the person and not an entity itself. Similarly, "himself" is a reflexive pronoun referring back to the person mentioned earlier in the paragraph.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
